SCOPe data were downloaded from the Foldseek repo:

- https://wwwuser.gwdguser.de/~compbiol/foldseek/

Classification information:

- https://scop.berkeley.edu/downloads/parse/dir.des.scope.2.01-stable.txt

Four classification levels are available (with example):

0. Class         (a)
1. Fold          (a.5)
2. Superfamily   (a.5.1)
3. Family        (a.5.1.1)
